welcome_benefits: ₹500 Voucher from Uber, Amazon, and Bigbasket on Spending ₹5,000 Within 30 Days of Card Issuance. 5% Cashback Upto ₹1,000 on the First EMI Transaction

Movie & Dining: Buy One Get One on Movie Tickets up to ₹250 on the District App, Twice Every Month
Rewards Rate: 3X RPs/₹150 Spent Upto Monthly Spends of ₹20,000. 10X Reward Points After Incremental Spends of ₹20,000.
Reward Redemption: Reward Points can be redeemed on the Poshvine redemption portal for shopping vouchers from many popular brands. 1 Reward Point = ₹0.25
Travel: Complimentary Spa Access at Popular Airports and Free Railway Lounge Access
Domestic Lounge Access: Up to 2 Free Visits to Domestic Airport Lounges Per Quarter
International Lounge Access: Up to 2 Complimentary International Lounge Visits Per Quarter
Golf: Complimentary golf rounds each month for every Rs. 20,000 spent in the previous month (max 2 golf rounds in a month).
Insurance Benefits: Travel-related insurance benefits including accidental air death insurance worth Rs. 1 crore, personal accident coverage worth Rs. 10 lakh, and lost card liability cover worth Rs. 50,000

fees_charges.Interest Rates: 0.75% to 3.5% per month depending upon the credit history of the card member.
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% Waiver Upto ₹400 Each Month for Fuel Transactions Between ₹200 and ₹5,000

product_details: A lifetime free card with exciting privileges.
Gift voucher worth ₹500 on spending ₹5,000 within 30 days and a 5% cashback on the first EMI transaction performed within 30 days of card setup.
10x Reward Points on large spends of ₹20,000 or more.
10x Reward Points on all transactions on your birthday.
Low-interest rate (0.75% – 3.5%) and low foreign currency markup (1.5%).
Two complimentary airport lounge access and spa visits every quarter.
Up to 2 complimentary rounds of golf every month on spending ₹20,000 monthly.
Air accident coverage is worth ₹1 crore, and personal accident coverage is worth ₹10 lakh.
